question_text: Which TWO reasons might lead a technician to choose passive cooling over fan-based cooling? (Select two)
answer_options: The system is used in a server room
The system is exposed to high dust environments
correct_answer: The system is exposed to high dust environments
explanation: Passive cooling is used when silence is critical or fans would fail prematurely due to dust. It's not ideal in enclosed, high-performance environments like server rooms.
